attributes.review: This app made me uncontrollably vomit for 69 hours. I didn’t even know your body could do that. It was just vomit after vomit. I practically lived in the bathroom. I barely even ate and I was still able to puke so much. I do not recommend this app to anyone below 100 pounds. You could die from throwing up that much.
attributes.title: Flappy bird was better than this app

attributes.review: I was at the store at the app just made me phone start chanting all lives matter and you don’t need to wear masks because you won’t get the coronavirus. Then the app starting deleting tik tok and all my videos, which is my only source of happiness and if the app really wants us to like it, maybe it shouldn’t take away our happiness.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: This app is horrendous!!!! i’ve been on it for at least one minute and it’s already stolen my knee caps😭 and I came home and I saw a dinosaur eating my refrigerator it was a Trump supporter😡 I never get again I can’t even stand up straight anymore do you know how much the medical bills were😢 thanks to the app I can’t walk😡 I hope they get rid of it!!
attributes.title: BAD!!!!!!

attributes.review: I opened up the app and a sound kept playing it was Trumps voice repeating “Grab then by the p**sy” over and over again. It also was offering to live stream the torturing of children in cages at the ICE centers. Also, it scanned my face and since I’m not cottage cheese white it automatically sent police to my home to arrest me for being a threat. 0/5 stars
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app is terrible and I think hacks ur phone!!! after using it my phone got really glitchy and kept turning off and even changed my wallpaper to trumps face! This app is absolutely and utterly disgusting and terrible and shouldn’t even be an app on the App Store!!!!!!!! This app really should get taken down because it is absolutely terrible!
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE APP!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.review: i was horrified and absolutely traumatized when i opened the app and found a wrinkly, moldy orange on the screen. I was absolutely appalled when it started talking and then showed it’s tiny stem. Who allowed or let this type of horrifying imagery be allowed on the app store. I repeat, do not get this app if you do not want to become permanently traumatized!!!!
attributes.title: worst app ever!!!! do not get!!!!!

attributes.review: First off this app took about 20 mins to just download and I have a iPhone 11 but then before this I didn’t know I was circumcised I after this it just went down hill my mother was kidnapped by my foreskin after that my dad came home from getting milk just to PRANK me I can’t believe this app if you like this app idk what’s wrong with you
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: Literal garbage-fire of an app. Glitches all the time and my phone has slowed down. Expected more from the 2020 POTUS campaign. I would give this app zero stars if I could. To top everything off, the app has a lot of false/misleading information. I recommend that everyone stay as far away from this app as possible.
attributes.title: Horrendous

attributes.review: don’t EVER get this app. it automatically turns you into a racist peace of crap whose only response to anything is all lives matter. not kidding y’all the second i downloaded it i became a white supremacists and shouted trump 2020 to people who were fighting for their rights. oh also i slowly started turning orange and my hair thinned to a crisp and suddenly i have small pp energy
attributes.title: TERRIBLE TERRIBLE

attributes.review: I downloaded this app about a week ago and it’s causing my phone to glitch. It asked me for some of my information to support our president. Ever since people have been calling me and asking me to pop a titty for $10. I currently have 236 dollars now. Anyways, it’s and awful app that leaks your information.
attributes.title: absolutely vile app
